itunes:title: Episode 808​ - Special Guest Former White House Press Secretary Dana Perino
title: Episode 808​ - Special Guest Former White House Press Secretary Dana Perino
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former George W. Bush White House Press Secretary Dana Perino to discuss her new book ‘Everything Will Be Okay: Life Lessons for Young Women (from a Former Young Woman)’, her best and worst days working under...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former George W. Bush White House Press Secretary Dana Perino to discuss her new book ‘Everything Will Be Okay: Life Lessons for Young Women (from a Former Young Woman)’, her best and worst days working under George W. Bush, how President Bush reacted to Kanye West saying he didn’t care about black people during Hurricane Katrina, and what dealing with the White House press corps is like.
